subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Iman Shumpert started the game in the backcourt, but the journeyman Mike Bibby was the key player in the Knicks’ easy road victory against the Pistons.
snippet: Iman Shumpert started the game in the backcourt, but the journeyman Mike Bibby was the key player in the Knicks’ easy road victory against the Pistons.
